price: 17. Kuwa ka dhowrsada (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale sida zinada, ribada, xasadka, xatooyada, dilka, beenta, khiyaanada, kibirka, iwm) waxay dhex ahaan beero iyo barwaaqo (Janno).

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
